description: Modern one bedroom in the heart of Chelsea, close to great restaurants and bars and the subway. Right next to the highline and great nightlife in meatpacking. 52 inch flat screen in the living room and 32 inch in th bedroom. Cable with movie channels included. The unit is recently renovated. 2 flights up, no elevator.
name: Chelsea 1bedroom
review: mathew's place was perfect for our visit.  the subway was less than a block away which made exploring all of manhattan and taking trips to brooklyn easy.  his apartment is located in quiet neighborhood but just minutes away from the busy city.  great city to visit and wonderful apartment to stay at.  i'd recommend getting the fish or shrimp tacos at los mariscos near chelsea market then head down the 15th street to blue bottle for your perfect cup of coffee.
